name: bulmaca
description: Crossword puzzle game â€“ monorepo root

scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --wait
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && cd frontend && npx expo start
scripts.start:ios: npm run docker:up && cd frontend && npx expo start --ios
scripts.start:android: npm run docker:up && cd frontend && npx expo start --android
scripts.db:reset: docker compose rm -fsv db && docker volume rm bulmaca_db-data 2>/dev/null; docker compose up db -d --wait
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/run-migrations.sh
